title: Dungeons & Dragons Chronicles of Mystara cracked
description:
Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara it is a remake of two projects, 
Dungeons & Dragons: Tower of Doom and Dungeons & Dragons: Shadow over Mystara. 
As in the original, the remake will have the opportunity to play vchetverom.


::System Requirements::


Operating system: Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Dual Core 1.8GHz (or higher) or AMD Athlon II X2 (or higher)	
RAM:1024 MB RAM
Free space on HDD: 315 MB
Video: nVidia GF6600 (or higher) or ATi X1600 (or higher) with 256MB of RAM


::Installation Steps::


1) Install the game by running setup.exe

2) run crack.jar from the crackfolder

3) Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder with the game

4) seed the game at least 5 times.

This crack works on STEAM :)


If you have any questions just ask
